name: Alhaitham
title: Admonishing Instruction
description: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free â€” free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Rushes forward, dealing <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> to nearby opponents when the rush ends, causing a Chisel-Light Mirror to form.
description.1: Holding this skill will cause it to behave differently.
description.4: Enters Aiming Mode to adjust the direction of Alhaitham's rush attack.
description.7: When this skill is unleashed, Alhaitham will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. If there are no Mirrors at this time, he will generate 1 additional Mirror. Chisel-Light Mirrors will have the following properties:
8: When he possesses Chisel-Light Mirrors, Alhaitham's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be converted to <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro>. This cannot be overridden.

When attacks of the aforementioned kind hit opponents, the Chisel-Light Mirrors will unleash a Projection Attack that deals <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro> based on the number of Mirrors on the field.
A total of 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors can exist at once.
The Chisel-Light Mirrors will disappear one after the other over time, and will all disappear when Alhaitham leaves the field.
description.10: "Truth inherently exists amidst uncertainty. Even the greatest of scholars are not immune to error."

description.0: Creates a Particular Binding Field and deals multiple instances of <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro>.
description.1: If Chisel-Light Mirrors exist when this ability is unleashed, all such Mirrors will be consumed and increase the number of DMG instances dealt.
description.2: 2s after this ability is unleashed, if 0/1/2/3 Mirrors were consumed, Alhaitham will generate 3/2/1/0 new Mirrors in turn.
description.4: "If a researcher makes wisdom their goal, then they should be prepared to make an enemy of every word they read. Only then can they avoid bias."

description.0: When Alhaitham's Charged or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, they will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.
Each point of Alhaitham's Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Projection Attacks and Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena by 0.1%.
description.1: The DMG of both aforementioned abilities can be increased by a maximum of 100% this way.

description.0: When Alhaitham crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.
When a Projection Attack hits an opponent, Universality: An Elaboration on Form's CD is decreased by 1.2s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

When Alhaitham generates a Chisel-Light Mirror, his Elemental Mastery will be increased by 50 for 8 seconds, max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered even when the maximum number of Chisel-Light Mirrors has been reached.
Increases the Level of Universality: An Elaboration on Form by 3.
When Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena is unleashed, the following effects will become active based on the number of Chisel-Light Mirrors consumed and created this time around:
1: Each Mirror consumed will increase the Elemental Mastery of all other nearby party members by 30 for 15s.
Each Mirror generated will grant Alhaitham a 10% <dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</dendro> for 15s.
description.3: The pre-existing duration of the aforementioned effects will be cleared if you use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena again while they are in effect.

description.0: Increases the Level of Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena by 3.

1: 2 seconds after Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena is unleashed, he will generate 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors regardless of the number of mirrors consumed.

If Alhaitham generates Chisel-Light Mirrors when their numbers have already maxed out, his CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 10% and 70% respectively for 6s. If this effect is triggered again during its initial duration, the duration remaining will be increased by 6s.
